1894–1895

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · II/7 · Pieces / Etudes · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky [including WoO 22]
  • Henle · HN 1486 · Etudes · ed. Valentina Rubtsova [including WoO 22]
  • Könemann · K 220 · Etudes · ed. Victor Ekimovsky [including WoO 22]
  • Peters · EP 9077a · Klavierwerke I / Etudes · ed. Günter Philipp
  • Peters · EP 9287a · ed. Günter Philipp
